confirmation_new_challenge: Finish this puzzle and start a new one?
game_over_message: You lost because you made {mistake} mistakes.
highlight_same_numbers_description: When a number is selected, all the other cells with the same numbers in will be highlighted.
prevent_mistake_note_description: Prevent users from filling wrong notes.
mistakes_limit_description: Limit the number of possible mistakes to {limit} per game.
hint_limit_description: Limit the number of hint to {limit} per game.
auto_remove_note_description: After the number is placed, notes are cleared automatically.
region_highlight_description: Highlight the row, column, block of selected cell.
how_to_select_cell: Select a cell you want to fill
how_to_select_number: Select the number to place into that cell.
how_to_erase: To remove an entered digit, click the Erase button.
how_to_notes: Use to add possible values to the selected cell.
how_to_hint: Click the Hint button to receive the result of the selected cell.
how_to_solution: Click the Solution button to reveal the solution to the current puzzle.
how_to_undo_redo: Clicking the Undo button reverses the most recent change made to the board. After clicking Undo, the Redo button will appear, allowing you to restore the undone move. You can undo and redo multiple recent moves.
game_description:
Sudoku is a logic-based puzzle where the goal is to fill a 9 × 9 grid with digits from 1 to 9. 
Each row, column, and 3 × 3 subgrid must contain every number exactly once. 

Starting with a partially filled grid, players use logic to find the unique solution, making Sudoku a challenging and rewarding mental exercise.
